TopicTitle: Request for adjustable units in the options

Articles.Content:
Hello, I have just a simple request for unit change options. I'd like to be able to set KSP2 to output speed in knots or MPH, distance in ft/miles, thrust in pounds, temperature in F.

 

Thanks

 

Edit

I'm not sure how this ended up in KSP2 Discussion, I thought I posted it in suggestions. Would it be possible for a moderator to move it? Thanks

Edited March 1, 2023 by Exorcet
Topic appeared in the wrong forum section
Thread moved from KSP 2 Discussion to KSP 2 Suggestions and Development.
